Bitcoin is Bitcoin, not Bitcoin Core or BCore. Core is the implementation client with the highest adoption within Bitcoin. Bitcoin Cash is not Bitcoin. But it equally is not BCash or BTrash.

Meanwhile, “current utility value” (CUV) will continue to chug along for those # crypto teams that continue to # buidl, indifferent to price. In a severe bear market, CUV will serve as a price support.

What we’re seeing in the # crypto markets right now is a compression of “discounted expected utility value” (DEUV), as regulatory fears grow, people incorporate new learnings (e.g., velocity expectations) & speculators sell bc their neighbors are selling.
